solution_line_template: Brody's calculator has {total_battery_capacity} * {remaining_fraction_val} = {total_battery_capacity} / {battery_remaining_divisor} = <<{total_battery_capacity}*{remaining_fraction_val}={battery_left_before_exam}>>{battery_left_before_exam} hours of battery left.

After his {exam_duration_hours}-hour math exam, Brody's calculator will have {battery_left_before_exam} - {exam_duration_hours} = <<{battery_left_before_exam}-{exam_duration_hours}={final_battery_left}>>{final_battery_left} hours of battery left.
